faculty.description:
Educating elites who inquire into the nature of humans as social beings and lead the achievement of social justice.

The College of Korean Medicine, established to educate skilled and devoted oriental medicine practitioners, has grown to become a reputable institute for research and education in the field of Korean medicine.

Highlights:

  • The Hall of Oriental Medicine in Busan's Yangjeong area offers a supportive setting for in-depth study and clinical training.
  • It has established itself as a leading institution in Korean medicine research and education.
  • The college is associated with two oriental medicine hospitals, one in Yangjeong (Busan) and another in Ulsan.
  • The College of Korean Medicine is known for educating skilled and dedicated practitioners of oriental medicine.
  • The college and its facilities emphasize the professional development of students as future leaders in Korean medicine

college_name: College of ICT (Information and Communication Technologies) Engineering

faculty.description:
Training ICT Exports that will Pioneer the Computerized Age of the 21st Century

Highlights:

  • The College of ICT Engineering is carrying out education and research on theory, technology and application in the area of computer, creative software, electrical, electronic and communication, digital contents, games, animations and films.
  • Our aim is to cultivate ICT fusion experts who lead in the advanced technology of the future and enrich the lives of many people.
